svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Number of patent applications per million residents versus the number of scientific or technical article publications per
million residents. Patent applications are worldwide patent applications filed through the Patent Cooperation Treaty
procedure or with a national patent office.
Source: Patent and publication rates - OWID based on World Bank & UN
